Name: Horus amulet
Description: The importance of the god Horus is mainly due to his connection with the myth of Osiris. As the son of Osiris, Horus takes over the rule of Egypt from his father. In this way Horus too becomes very important for the deceased. He is also one of the gods in the judgement scene in the Book of the Dead. The Horus amulet depicts the god as a man with a falcon's head. He is wearing a short kilt and has the double crown on top of his wig.
